quote: There is no greater will on earth than the will to survive. These fine people, answering my father's call to arms, had the will in spades and droves. - Lord Tristan Dracanburh, Ethandun
quote_letters: THERE IS NO GREATER WILL ON EARTH THAN THE WILL TO SURVIVE THESE FINE PEOPLE ANSWERING MY FATHERS CALL TO ARMS HAD THE WILL IN SPADES AND DROVES - LORD TRISTAN DRACANBURH ETHANDUN
